archimate:Goal.name: Significant Product Quality Upgrade
archimate:Goal.documentation:
This means that we have much higher expectations for product quality and services than ever before as well as our clients do. With Vlad Martyanovâ€™s leadership and his collaboration with INFUSE BI team, a new product quality measurement tool was developed. Our goal is to consistently lower rejection rates and returns from our clients, which are being tracked and measured by this tool. More details on it will be provided to respective ops teams. Some teams already use the tool in their daily activities.
In order to achieve this goal, in addition to the software solutions, we must dedicate our close attention to the professional development and upskill of our teams.
